attributes.action: bring in police to investigate all claims made by members of parliament for expences related to parliamentry business and all claimes to be open to public scrutiny.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: due to the recent findings of claimes made by some mps to be less than justified all claimes should now be investigated by the police fraud department and anybody found making fraudulent claimes to be prosicuted to the full extent of the law.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
